item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Hello! I was born and grew up in a small mountain town, Xixia. I spent four years at Xi’an, Shannxi, and obtained my Bachelor degree at Xi’an Jiaotong University(2012-2016). And I received my Master degree at Purdue University, concentrating on Deep Learning and Computer Vision. I was an intern of AIsense Inc at 2018, working on automatic speech recognition (ASR). Currently, I am a Research Engineer on Computer Vision at Zebra technologies corportation, working at the Chief Technologies Office (CTO), developing computer/machine vision algorithms.

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Deep Learning Professional I am a final year master student in the Department of Mechanical Engineering at Purdue University. I am a member of Prof. Liang Pan’s lab. My current research interest lies in Deep Learning and Computer Vision. Right now I am focusing on a project of Fine-Grained Visual Categorization (FGVC) on iNaturalist Dataset with attention model. I am also interested in cutting-edge reinforcement learning/NLP technologies. Before coming here, I was a research assistant in Prof.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section. I am a teaching instructor for the following courses at University X: CS101: An intro to computer science CS102: An intro to computer science CS103: An intro to computer science CS104: An intro to computer science CS105: An intro to computer science CS106: An intro to computer science CS107: An intro to computer science
